title: (x) Cy Twombly Glyptic - Unifur {Ignacio}
content: It reminds me of [Banjoman](http://web.archive.org/web/20050824100327/http:/www.fonts.com/findfonts/detail.asp?pid=206205), but the G & Y are different. However, it wouldn't take much effort to duplicate this with that font. Use some of the lower case to replace upper case, or vice versa.
author: bowfinpw

comments.content: Tobias B. Kï¿½hler's [Unifur](http://web.archive.org/web/20050824100327/http:/www.webfontlist.com/pages/station.asp?ID=12199&x=Fonts) ... and yes, I think it works.
Except for that awful e! What was he thinking?
